Interests

Apart from staying indoors and working on my personal projects, I also enjoy being outdoors. I also ride bicycle in early mornings around the city. It really freshens me up and gets me ready for the whole day working, studying or reading.

When forced indoors, I always work on my personal projects and make prototypes or I play with my two beloved dog. If I'm feeling lazy, I watch twitch streams and watch Documentary movies on netflix.
